metadata.title: CVE-2024-27074 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:go7007: fix a memleak in go7007_load_encoder In go7007_load_encoder,bounce(i.e. go->boot_fw), is allocated without a deallocation thereafter.After the following call chain: saa7134_go7007_init |-> go7007_boot_encoder|-> go7007_load_encoder |-> kfree(go) go is freed and thus bounce isleaked.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
